revision.text: Possibly: Moral tales, by M. Marmontel. In three volumes. ... (Jean-François Marmontel). (Edinburgh : Printed by A. Donaldson, and sold at his shops in London and Edinburgh, 1768). http://www.worldcat.org/oclc/181804341
